snippet: The second round of the RBC Heritage was cut short because of rain on Hilton Head Island, S.C.
abstract: K J Choi maintains lead after second round of the RBC Heritage, which was cut short because of rain; other golf news noted.
lead_paragraph: The second round of the RBC Heritage was cut short because of rain on Hilton Head Island, S.C.

headline.main: Choi Is in Front as Play Is Suspended
headline.print_headline: Choi Is in Front as Play Is Suspended
